## Inject() function

Inject a service for his utilization

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function Inject(key: string | symbol): (target: any, targetKey: string, index: number) => void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  key | string \| symbol | Key value to reference service |

(target: any, targetKey: string, index: number) =&gt; void
